item.title: 加纳重整部分贷款，启动短期债务市场
item.description: 加纳已经启动了一个短期债务交易市场，这个平台建立在八年多前创建的固定收益市场基础之上，而且是在该国根据国际货币基金组织的一项计划重组债务以使其可持续发展之际启动的。【原文：Ghana has started a market for trading short-term debt, a platform that builds on the fixed income market created more than eight years ago, and comes as the country restructures debt to make it sustainable under an International Monetary Fund program.】

item.title: 美国银行和巴克莱市政债券策略师对夏季反弹意见不一
item.description: 在 4 万亿美元的市政债券市场上，有两家最大的银行在夏季是否会带来州或地方政府债务的反弹，还是会让投资者失望的问题上产生了矛盾。【原文：Two of the biggest banks in the $4 trillion municipal bond market are conflicted over whether the summer will bring a rally for state or local government debt or instead leave investors disappointed.】

item.title: 奇货通讯中国房地产泡沫带来的好处
item.description: 您好，欢迎阅读《奇货》周刊，乔-魏森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）将为您带来他们对市场、金融和经济领域最有趣发展的看法。【原文：Hello and welcome to the weekly Odd Lots newsletter, where Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway bring you their thoughts on the most interesting developments in markets, finance and the economy.】

item.title: 意大利零售债券需求减弱，梅洛尼亮起警示灯
item.description: 意大利总理乔治亚-梅洛尼（Giorgia Meloni）的财政状况刚刚亮起了警灯，因为她的政府在明知需求会减弱的情况下，仍强行向消费者出售债务。【原文：A warning light for Italy’s finances just flashed for Premier Giorgia Meloni after her government pressed ahead with a debt sale to consumers even though it knew demand would weaken.】

item.title: 美国谷物供应趋紧，导致价格上涨
item.description: 根据美国的一项重要预测，由于各经济体仍在应对顽固的通货膨胀，下一季全球谷物供应将更加紧张，为农产品价格上涨创造条件。【原文：Global grain supplies will be tighter in the coming season, setting the stage for higher prices for agricultural commodities as economies are still copping with stubborn inflation, according to a key US forecast.】

item.title: 美元流入减少，前景黯淡，奈拉涨势逆转
item.description: 尼日利亚奈拉逆转了近期的涨势，目前是上个月全球表现最差的货币，这加大了央行继续加息的压力。【原文：Nigeria’s naira has reversed recent gains and is now the world’s worst performing currency in the last month, increasing pressure on the central bank to keep raising interest rates.】

item.title: 诺瓦克斯公司股票大涨 146%，给空头带来 "肋骨紧缩 "的压力
item.description: Novavax Inc. 15 年多来最大的单日涨幅迫使一些押注该股的卖空者亏损离场。【原文：Novavax Inc.’s biggest one-day gain in more than 15 years is forcing some short sellers betting against the stock to exit their positions at a loss.】

item.title: 高风险期权押注债券反弹，可能损失数百万美元
item.description: 对于至少一位国债期权交易员来说，下周的通胀数据可能带来意外之财，也可能带来灾难性损失。【原文：For at least one Treasury options trader next week’s inflation data could produce either a windfall or a catastrophic loss.】

item.title: 中国电动汽车制造商 Zeekr 扩大美国 IPO 后股价上涨 40
item.description: 浙江吉利控股集团有限公司旗下的高端电动汽车品牌 Zeekr Intelligent Technology Holding Ltd. 在扩大首次公开募股规模后，股价涨幅高达 40%，这是自 2021 年以来中国公司在美国上市的最大一笔交易。【原文：Shares of Zeekr Intelligent Technology Holding Ltd., the high-end electric car brand under Zhejiang Geely Holding Group Co., rose as much as 40% after an expanded initial public offering that’s the biggest US listing by a China-based company since 2021.】

item.title: 文艺复兴科技公司 "量化之王 "吉姆-西蒙斯逝世，享年 86 岁
item.description: 吉姆-西蒙斯（Jim Simons），这位数学家兼投资家在他的秘密公司文艺复兴科技（Renaissance Technologies）创造了许多金融界人士认为世界上最伟大的赚钱机器，现已去世。享年 86 岁。【原文：Jim Simons, the mathematician-investor who created what many in finance consider the world’s greatest moneymaking machine at his secretive firm, Renaissance Technologies, has died. He was 86.】

item.title: 美国大选和体育博彩衍生品面临 CFTC 禁令
item.description: 美国最高金融监管机构迈出了重要一步，直接禁止利用金融衍生品为政治竞赛和体育比赛下注；这为那些希望为 11 月美国大选下注的人又设置了一道障碍。【原文：A top financial regulator took a major step toward directly banning derivatives from being used to bet on political contests and sports games — throwing up another hurdle for those hoping to wager on November’s US election.】

item.title: 国际能源署警告 "欧佩克+"控制油价以避免通胀加剧
item.description: 国际能源机构执行主任法提赫-比罗尔（Fatih Birol）说，欧佩克+产油国下次开会决定石油减产时，不应采取会推高油价从而刺激通胀的行动。【原文：OPEC+ producers shouldn’t take actions that would push oil prices up and thus boost inflation when they meet next to decide on their oil production cuts, said Fatih Birol, executive director of the International Energy Agency.】

item.title: 可可供应商 Natra 正在洽谈收购巧克力双雄 Gubor 和 Nutkao
item.description: 据知情人士透露，欧洲可可供应商纳特拉公司正在与包括私人信贷基金在内的贷款机构洽谈，为可能收购的两家企业融资。【原文：European cocoa supplier Natra is in conversations with lenders, including private credit funds, to finance a potential purchase of two businesses, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 美国银行发现短期股票交易损害收益
item.description: 美国银行（Bank of America）的分析师表示，股票投资者希望在较短时间内交易股票，而不是长期持有，这可能会限制他们的收益。【原文：Equity investors looking at trading shares within a shorter period of time instead of holding them for longer are potentially limiting their returns, according to analysts at Bank of America.】

item.title: 巴西又一大丰收即将拯救世界食糖市场
item.description: 巴西食糖连续第二年丰产，这将使食糖价格在更长的时间内保持较低水平，从而使多年来饱受食糖短缺之苦的买家松了一口气。【原文：A second year of bumper sugar production in Brazil is set to keep prices lower for longer, bringing relief to buyers that have struggled with years of shortages.】

item.title: BBVA 对萨瓦德尔的不懈追求颠覆了西班牙银行业
item.description: 毕尔巴鄂比斯开亚银行（Banco Bilbao Vizcaya Argentaria SA）第二次尝试收购萨瓦德尔银行（Banco de Sabadell SA），但并不受欢迎。【原文：Banco Bilbao Vizcaya Argentaria SA’s second attempt to buy Banco de Sabadell SA isn’t proving popular.】

item.title: 埃弗顿收购方钱柜 777 因竞购失败而聘请重组集团
item.description: 据周四发给集团员工的一封电子邮件称，试图收购英超埃弗顿足球俱乐部的美国投资公司 777 Partners 已聘请重组专家来克服 "各种运营挑战"。【原文：777 Partners, the US investment firm trying to buy English Premier League football club Everton, has hired restructuring experts to overcome “various operational challenges,” according to an email sent to the group’s employees Thursday.】

item.title: 美国两年期收益率因通胀忧虑升至一周高点
item.description: 在消费者通胀预期指数意外上升后，国债收益率上升，两年期国债收益率达到本周最高水平。【原文：Treasury yields rose, with the two-year note’s reaching its highest level of the week, after a gauge of consumer inflation expectations unexpectedly rose.】

item.title: 加拿大就业下滑后，核心通胀成为降息线索的焦点
item.description: 就业报告的热度高于预期，这意味着核心通胀率需要令人信服地降温，加拿大央行才会在 6 月份降息。【原文：A hotter-than-expected jobs report means core inflation needs to be convincingly cooler for the Bank of Canada to go ahead with a June rate cut.】

item.title: 康查-伊-托罗公司（Concha y Toro）在葡萄酒供不应求的情况下重返增长模式
item.description: 拉丁美洲顶级葡萄酒制造商 Vina Concha y Toro SA 在经历了全球葡萄酒供应过剩所导致的两年低迷之后，重新回到了增长模式，这家总部位于圣地亚哥的公司更换了一些葡萄树，增加了新产品，并对交易持开放态度。【原文：Top Latin American winemaker Vina Concha y Toro SA is back in growth mode after a two-year slump marked by a global wine glut, with the Santiago-based firm replacing some vines, adding new products and open to dealmaking.】

item.title: 一次民意调查如何改变南非债券市场的命运
item.description: 一项有影响力的民意调查缓解了南非债券投资者对本月选举结果的焦虑。【原文：It took one influential opinion poll to ease anxiety among South African bond investors over the outcome of this month’s election.】

item.title: 无处藏身：通胀颠覆债券和外汇关系，避风港消失殆尽
item.description: 股票下跌，债券上涨，这是华尔街的老生常谈。但持续不断的价格压力颠覆了这一真理，让投资者开始寻找避风港。【原文：It’s an old saw on Wall Street — when stocks tank, bonds rise. But incessant price pressures have upended the truism and left investors searching for refuge.】

item.title: PAI 公司推迟退出雀巢冰淇淋价值 100 亿美元的合资公司
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，欧洲私募股权公司 PAI Partners 正在与投资者洽谈新基金事宜，以持有其与雀巢公司合资的冰淇淋公司 50% 的股份。【原文：European private equity firm PAI Partners is in talks with investors about a new fund to hold its 50% stake in its ice cream joint venture with Nestle SA, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 奥特曼支持的 Oklo 公司股票在 SPAC 交易火爆后首次亮相便出现暴跌
item.description: 由山姆-奥特曼（Sam Altman）支持的先进核系统开发商 Oklo Inc.【原文：Shares of Oklo Inc., a developer of advanced nuclear systems backed by Sam Altman, slumped Friday in its debut after merging with a blank-check company sponsored by the OpenAI chief executive and serial dealmaker Michael Klein.】

item.title: 中国央行警告政府债券上涨中的风险
item.description: 中国央行对长达数月的政府债券市场涨势再次发出隐晦警告，强调其对数十年低收益率拖累本国货币的不安。【原文：China’s central bank issued another veiled warning on a months-long government bond market rally, underlining its discomfort with decades-low yields that have weighed on the nation’s currency.】

item.title: 蛋糕公司出售特许经营支持债券筹资 2.4 亿美元
item.description: Nothing Bundt Cakes 是一家以一种蛋糕而闻名的连锁面包店，该公司正在推销以其几乎所有资产为担保的 2.4 亿美元债券，这为证券化债务市场上的神秘发行产品增添了新的活力。【原文：Nothing Bundt Cakes, a chain of bakeries known for one type of cake, is marketing a $240 million bond backed by nearly all of its assets, adding to the stream of esoteric offerings in the securitized debt market.】

item.title: 美国银行称投资者对较长期限美国债券的胃口大增
item.description: 美国银行的一项客户调查显示，自从美联储发出不太可能加息的信号，为今年晚些时候的减息奠定了基础之后，市场对较长期限美国债券的兴趣大增。【原文：Appetite for longer-dated US bonds has shot up since the Federal Reserve signaled interest-rate hikes are unlikely, laying the groundwork for cuts later this year, according to a Bank of America client survey.】

item.title: Archegos 案开庭审理，Bill Hwang 辩方面临严峻挑战
item.description: Archegos 资本管理公司创始人 Bill Hwang 将针对欺诈和操纵市场的指控为自己辩护，提出华尔街的一个老生常谈的论点：他不对对方的损失负责。【原文：Archegos Capital Management founder Bill Hwang will defend himself against fraud and market manipulation charges by making a time-honored Wall Street argument: he’s not responsible for the other side’s losses.】
